author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Alamos Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.03
text:
May 1 (Reuters) - Alamos Gold Inc:
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.00 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.03 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* PRODUCED 128,900 OUNCES OF GOLD IN QUARTER , 34% HIGHER THAN Q1 OF 2017
* ALAMOS GOLD-RAISED 2018 PRODUCTION GUIDANCE AT BOTH MULATOS & ISLAND GOLD, BRINGING COMPANY-WIDE GUIDANCE TO RANGE OF 490,000-530,000 OUNCES OF GOLD
* EXPECTS COMBINED ANNUAL GOLD PRODUCTION OF AT LEAST 500,000 OUNCES FROM ITS EXISTING OPERATIONS IN 2019 AND 2020 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
